posts.title: Cat People
posts.excerpt: Plot :The Cat People originated way back in time, when humans sacrificed their women to Leopards, who mated with them. Cat People look similar to humans, but must mate with other Cat People. We follow brother and sister – who seem to be the only ones of their kind left

posts.title: Moos auf den Steinen
posts.excerpt: Description Engaged to the daughter of an aging baron, an ambitious advertising executive wishes to renovate the baron’s crumbling castle into a holiday getaway for the social elite. posts._title: Michael Glawogger – Das Vaterspiel AKA Kill Daddy Good Night (2009)
posts.title: Das Vaterspiel
posts.excerpt: “An Austrian videogame designer (Helmut Köpping) who has turned his pathological hatred for his politician father into a life’s mission to create a father-killing videogame, ends-up, through a set of curious circumstances, renovating the basement hideout in Long Island of a Lithuanian Nazi. “

posts.title: Diabolo menthe
posts.excerpt: In the fall of 1963, Anne is becoming a teenager. She lives in Paris with her mother and her older sister, Frédérique. They’re just back from summer at the beach with their father. posts.title: Kairat
posts.excerpt: Quote: This 34-year-old filmmaker has invented an entire universe,” wrote Jean-Michel Frodon in Le Monde, and he was right. Darezhan Omirbaev may well have been inspired by Bresson and Hitchcock, but he has indeed created his very own universe in the five films he’s made since the late 80s. posts.title: Mikkô zero rain

posts._title: Nelson Carlo de Los Santos Arias – Cocote (2017)
posts.title: Cocote
posts.excerpt: Alberto, an evangelical gardener, returns to his hometown to attend the funeral of his father, who was killed by an influential man. To mourn the deceased, he is forced to participate to religious celebrations that are contrary to his will and beliefs.
posts.director: Nelson Carlo de Los Santos Arias
